name: All Nighter (Michael_Willner)
description: In middle school, I wanted to be in the advanced math class, but my teacher's did not think I was smart enough to be able to take it. After debating over it, I was able to get in on the condition that I would do well. The class was tough and I ended up pulling my first all-nighter in order to complete an assignment for it. This game simulates that night.
